alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 7:08PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Otero, east central Sierra and northeastern Dona Ana Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 707 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northeast of Northrup Landing, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, pea size hail, and blowing dust possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Blowing dust will create reductions in visibilities. Locations impacted include... Northrup Landing and White Sands National Monument. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
